Error.description: Error is returned when a handler encounters an error. It contains a simple error message that the developer can customize.

message.description: Error message (e.g., 'user not found', 'database connection failed')

FieldViolation.description: FieldViolation describes a single validation error for a specific field.

description.description: Human-readable description of the validation violation (e.g., 'must be a valid email address', 'required field missing')

field.description: The field path that failed validation (e.g., 'user.email' for nested fields). For header validation, this will be the header name (e.g., 'X-API-Key')

partnerCountry.description: WTO member code of partner country (e.g. "156" = China).

productSector.description: Product sector filter (HS chapter). Empty = aggregate.

reportingCountry.description: WTO member code of reporting country (e.g. "840" = US).

years.description: Number of years to look back (default 10, max 30).

fetchedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when data was fetched from WTO.

upstreamUnavailable.description: True if upstream fetch failed and results may be stale/empty.

GetTradeBarriersRequest.description: Request for SPS/TBT trade barrier notifications.

items.description: WTO member codes to filter by. Empty = all.

limit.description: Max results to return (server caps at 100).

measureType.description: Filter by measure type: "SPS", "TBT", or empty for both.

fetchedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when data was fetched from WTO.

upstreamUnavailable.description: True if upstream fetch failed and results may be stale/empty.

GetTradeFlowsRequest.description: Request for bilateral trade flow data.

partnerCountry.description: WTO member code of partner country.

reportingCountry.description: WTO member code of reporting country.

years.description: Number of years to look back (default 10, max 30).

fetchedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when data was fetched from WTO.

upstreamUnavailable.description: True if upstream fetch failed and results may be stale/empty.

items.description: WTO member codes to filter by. Empty = all.

limit.description: Max results to return (server caps at 100).

GetTradeRestrictionsResponse.description: Response containing trade restrictions and fetch metadata.

fetchedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when data was fetched from WTO.

upstreamUnavailable.description: True if upstream fetch failed and results may be stale/empty.

TariffDataPoint.description: Single tariff data point for a reporter-partner-product combination.

indicatorCode.description: WTO indicator code used for this datapoint.

partnerCountry.description: WTO member code of partner country.

reportingCountry.description: WTO member code of reporting country.

TradeBarrier.description: SPS or TBT trade barrier notification.

dateDistributed.description: ISO 8601 date when notification was distributed.

sourceUrl.description: WTO source document URL (must be http/https protocol).

TradeFlowRecord.description: Bilateral trade flow record for a reporting-partner pair.

exportValueUsd.description: Merchandise export value in millions USD.

importValueUsd.description: Merchandise import value in millions USD.

partnerCountry.description: WTO member code of partner country.

reportingCountry.description: WTO member code of reporting country.

TradeRestriction.description: Quantitative restriction or export control measure notified to WTO.

notifiedAt.description: ISO 8601 date when measure was notified.

productSector.description: Product sector or HS chapter description.

reportingCountry.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 or WTO member code of reporting country.

sourceUrl.description: WTO source document URL (must be http/https protocol).

ValidationError.description: ValidationError is returned when request validation fails. It contains a list of field violations describing what went wrong.

get.description: Get tariff rate timeseries for a country pair.

parameters.description: WTO member code of reporting country (e.g. "840" = US).
parameters.name: reporting_country

parameters.description: WTO member code of partner country (e.g. "156" = China).
parameters.name: partner_country

parameters.description: Product sector filter (HS chapter). Empty = aggregate.
parameters.name: product_sector

parameters.description: Number of years to look back (default 10, max 30).
parameters.name: years

parameters.description: WTO member codes to filter by. Empty = all.
parameters.name: countries

parameters.description: Filter by measure type: "SPS", "TBT", or empty for both.
parameters.name: measure_type

parameters.description: Max results to return (server caps at 100).
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: WTO member code of reporting country.
parameters.name: reporting_country

parameters.description: WTO member code of partner country.
parameters.name: partner_country

parameters.description: Number of years to look back (default 10, max 30).
parameters.name: years

get.description: Get quantitative restrictions and export controls.

parameters.description: WTO member codes to filter by. Empty = all.
parameters.name: countries

parameters.description: Max results to return (server caps at 100).
parameters.name: limit
